title: Unable to enter lobbies
body:
If I load up league, and then not use it for a short period, suddenly I become completely unable to enter lobbies of any kind. I get a notification saying that  "something unexpected" has happened. This only started in the last two days, and it is annoying as if I stop playing LoL for any amount of time, I have to completely shut it down, and log back in.

How can I fix this?

replies.body: That's not necessarily something you *can* fix. If you leave the client alone for an extended amount of time, the client is going to lose its connection. The only way to stop that from happening is to either actively use the client while it's open, or simply close it when it's not being used. Going forward, just close out of the client anytime you're done playing.

If even stop using it just to go to the bathroom it starts acting like this, and it only started in the past few days. I have to either play nonstop without any breaks of any kind, or restart the game each time I want to play even a single match.
